name: Dummy!
description: Which of you is the most erudite? Do you think that you know a certain topic better than your friends? Welcome to Dummy! Here you can find out whether you really believe in yourself.Battle of minds!Gather a group of friends for up to 10 people, choose the interesting question pack with the necessary topics and compete, collecting points that will bring you victory!Creating PacksCreate question packs. An intuitive editor for creating questions will allow you to create really interesting topics! Then share the questions you created with other players in the Steam Workshop.No friends? No problem!Find rivals online. There will always be a person who will put your knowledge into question!
